reviewText: Been looking for this for a long time. A little known segment of history. The Genzai Bakudan, as it was called was made known to me in Japan, in the late 1970's. At the time I thought it was a strange story, with little or no, proof to verify it. As time goes on more and more comes to light. Which proves two things, one that the truth will always come forward; and second truth is always stranger than fiction. If you want to know how North Korea got the bomb watch this.
